text: Ciro Liguori (born 29 November 1969) is an Italian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Salerno
title: Ciro Liguori
